// src/pages/HomePage.jsx import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const HomePage = () => { return (

Zakaat Calculator

Calculate your Zakaat easily and accurately. Understand your zakatable assets and deductible debts.

Sign In Sign Up

What is Zakaat?

Zakaat is a form of almsgiving treated as a religious obligation or tax in Islam, which, by Quranic ranking, is next after prayer in importance.

Nisab Threshold

The Nisab threshold for gold is 85 grams, and for silver, it is 595 grams. Ensure you meet the minimum threshold before calculating Zakaat.

); }; export default HomePage;
